description: This file implements a React component for handling OAuth callback redirects in a Next.js web application. It reads URL query parameters to determine the OAuth provider and status, then redirects the user accordingly without exposing sensitive data.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouter
methods.description: Main component that wraps the OAuth callback handling in a Suspense boundary, showing a loading message while processing.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouterInner
methods.description: Inner component that extracts URL parameters and performs redirection based on OAuth provider and status.
